description.@en: This simple forked stick allows me to commune with the earth, and I can ask it to provide me with her bounty.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever attempting to track a threat classified as Humanoid (including player cultures), find a source of water or navigate to a location using a divining rod, substitute Incantation in place of other Skills required to do so. Randomly determine three Common Spells you learn as free Unique Abilities from the Common Spells Listings table. Finally, you can Risk Backlash and Unfetter your Spells (covered in Article 7: Combat Encounters and Article 9: Hexenmeister’s Almanack).
